TopicTitle: How long will I be able to download KSP?

Articles.Content: I was wondering how long I will be able to download a fresh version of KSP? I keep fatally injuring my game with mods and a few times I've had to resort to a complete reinstallation of KSP...

I've had KSP since 0.20. Got it from the KSP homepage. Always been able to download a fresh copy. As long as you have your information from when you got it and where (KSP Homepage, Steam, ect...) them you should be able to get a fresh copy of the latest version when ever you need to. Since I run a lot of mods, I find i need to do a fresh install on occasion do to game corruption cause I messed something up on the install of said mods. For that I just keep the original download of the installer or the zip somewhere on my computer.
